name: symbol-bootstrap-core
description: Symbol Typescript/Javascript Library that allows you creating, configuring and running Symbol's simple node networks or nodes to be sync with existing networks.

scripts.doc: shx mkdir -p ts-docs && typedoc --out "ts-docs" src && touch ./ts-docs/.nojekyll
scripts.purge: shx rm -rf lib coverage node_modules target .nyc_output logs.log ts-docs
scripts.build: shx rm -rf lib && npm run compile
scripts.lib: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.prepack: shx rm -rf lib && npm run compile
scripts.style:fix: npm run create-index-files && npm run prettier && npm run lint:fix

author: Fernando Boucquez <fboucquez@gmail.com>
